templates.name: Jewelry care
templates.content: We recommend giving your jewelry a quick clean at the end of the day, using a soft cleaning cloth to remove any fingerprints or oils that may have accumulated from normal wear. You can take a look at our jewelry care instructions here: https://help.dorado.com/en-US/how-to-take-care-of-jewelry-694486

templates.name: Are your products real gold?
templates.content:
The 18k gold plated gold means the jewelry is not made entirely of gold. Instead, it has a base of hypoallergenic stainless steel that is coated with a thin layer of 18k gold.

For more detailed information, you can check out this link: https://dorado.attn.tv/aGOmekeDOTXx

templates.name: Can I use more than one/multiple codes
templates.content: I'm afraid only one promotional coupon code, voucher, or free gift can be used per purchase. Sorry about that!

templates.name: Is your jewelry nickel free?
templates.content: All our products are 100% nickel-free, except for items made of white gold.

templates.name: How are your items packaged?
templates.content: Dorado Fashion accessories come tucked into an aesthetic box - perfect for gifting. You may also choose to add a Gift Bag to your order: https://www.doradofashion.com/products/gift-bag

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.doradofashion.com/apps/parcelpanel

templates.name: Where will the engravings be placed on the 3d bar necklace?
templates.content:
The placing of the engraving depends on how many inscriptions you would like on your Engraved 3D Bar Necklace. Custom text is to be entered as shown: Text 1 / Text 2 / Text 3 / Text 4.

1 Text - Front engraving
2 Texts - Right and front engraving
3 Texts - Right, front and left engraving
4 Texts - Right, front, left and back engraving

The right and left placing is the position when it is not on you.

templates.name: Can I order my necklace in other languages?
templates.content: Yes! Simply enter your text into the custom text field in your desired language. All letter accent symbols are supported.

templates.name: Can I order my necklace with special characters?
templates.content: We can add most characters to our jewelry as long as they appear on the English keyboard. All you need to do is place your order with the special character included.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/doradofashionco/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/doradofashiononline

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@doradofashion.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and apply for our ambassador program here: https://support.doradofashion.com/article/qn5hypg3lr-become-an-ambassador-for-dorado-fashion

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Can I use emojis in the custom text?
templates.content: The only emoji you can use is the heart emoji ❤️. All other emojis won't be designed on your items.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content:
Due to the custom nature of personalized items, we cannot offer returns or exchanges for personalized items. Your personalized jewelry is designed just for you! However, if there is an issue or defect with your order, we will replace it at no additional cost. 

In the case of non-personalized items, if you're not satisfied, you can exchange or return within 30 days of your purchase. Unfortunately, we can't offer you a return or exchange if 30 days have passed.

 You can check out our return policy in detail here: https://www.doradofashion.com/policies/refund-policy

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@doradofashion.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 24 hours and production can take up to 2 weeks. We usually ship via USPS or FedEx and once shipped, it will take up to 7 business days for domestic orders, and up to 14 business days for international orders.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@doradofashion.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://dorado.com/en-ww/pages/size-guide

templates.name: How do I use my gift card/store credit?
templates.content:
E-gift cards and store credit function like a digital wallet and can be used exclusively for online purchases. 

To redeem your e-gift card or store credit, simply enter the provided code in the Discount/Gift Card box at checkout. You're welcome to use multiple gift cards for a single purchase!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $49. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: How to initiate a return?
templates.content: Good question! You can initiate a return via this link: https://returns.dorado.com/#/
